languages.text: "А кому служит Вольный Торговец? Золотому Трону? Протекторату? Быть может, одно вытекает из другого? И коль так, есть ли смысл об этом рассуждать?"
"And whom does the Rogue Trader serve? The Golden Throne? The protectorate? Could it be that one stems from the other? And if so, is there any sense in discussing it?"
languages.original_text: "А кому служит Вольный Торговец? Золотому Трону? Протекторату? Быть может, одно вытекает из другого? И коль так, есть ли смысл об этом рассуждать?"

traits.locale_text: "And whom does the Rogue Trader serve? The Golden Throne? The trade empire? Perhaps one stems from the other? And if it is so, is there any sense in discussing it?"
"And whom does the Rogue Trader serve? The Golden Throne? The trade empire? Perhaps one stems from the other? And if it is so, is there any sense in discussing it?"
"And whom does the Rogue Trader serve? The Golden Throne? The trade empire? Could it be that one stems from the other? And if so, is there any sense in discussing it?"
"And whom does the Rogue Trader serve? The Golden Throne? The trade empire? Could it be that one stems from the other? And if so, is there any sense in discussing it?"
"And whom does the Rogue Trader serve? The Golden Throne? The protectorate? Could it be that one stems from the other? And if so, is there any sense in discussing it?"

languages.text: “那么，行商浪人侍奉的又是谁？是他的王朝，还是黄金王座？有没有可能其中一个源于另一个？如果是这种情况，讨论这个问题真的有意义吗？”
languages.original_text: "And whom does the Rogue Trader serve? The Golden Throne? The protectorate? Could it be that one stems from the other? And if so, is there any sense in discussing it?"

traits.locale_text: “那么，行商浪人侍奉的又是谁？是他的王朝，还是黄金王座？有没有可能其中一个源于另一个？如果是这种情况，讨论这个问题真的有意义吗？”

languages.text: «¿Y a quién sirve {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente? ¿Al Trono Dorado? ¿A su protectorado? ¿No cree que uno proviene del otro? Y, siendo así, ¿tiene sentido entrar en detalles?».
languages.original_text: "And whom does the Rogue Trader serve? The Golden Throne? The protectorate? Could it be that one stems from the other? And if so, is there any sense in discussing it?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y a quién sirve {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente? ¿Al Trono Dorado? ¿A su protectorado? ¿No cree que uno proviene del otro? Y, siendo así, ¿tiene sentido entrar en detalles?».

languages.text: 「では、自由開拓者は誰に仕えているのでしょう？黄金の玉座でしょうか？保護領でしょうか？1本の茎は他から伸びてきたものかもしれません。そんな議論に何の意味があるでしょうか」
languages.original_text: "And whom does the Rogue Trader serve? The Golden Throne? The protectorate? Could it be that one stems from the other? And if so, is there any sense in discussing it?"

traits.locale_text: 「では、自由開拓者は誰に仕えているのでしょう？黄金の玉座でしょうか？保護領でしょうか？1本の茎は他から伸びてきたものかもしれません。そんな議論に何の意味があるでしょうか」

languages.text: "Und wem dient {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}? Dem Goldenen Thron? Dem Protektorat? Erwächst vielleicht das eine aus dem anderen? Und falls ja, ergibt es irgendeinen Sinn, darüber zu sprechen?"
languages.original_text: "And whom does the Rogue Trader serve? The Golden Throne? The protectorate? Could it be that one stems from the other? And if so, is there any sense in discussing it?"

traits.locale_text: "Und wem dient {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}? Dem Goldenen Thron? Dem Protektorat? Erwächst vielleicht das eine aus dem anderen? Und falls ja, ergibt es irgendeinen Sinn, darüber zu sprechen?"

languages.text: « Et qui {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} sert-{mf|il|elle} ? Le Trône d'Or ? Ou le protectorat ? Ne pourrait-on pas considérer l'un comme le prolongement de l'autre ? Et en ce cas, est-il vraiment besoin d'en discuter ? »
languages.original_text: "And whom does the Rogue Trader serve? The Golden Throne? The protectorate? Could it be that one stems from the other? And if so, is there any sense in discussing it?"

traits.locale_text: « Et qui {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} sert-{mf|il|elle} ? Le Trône d'Or ? Ou le protectorat ? Ne pourrait-on pas considérer l'un comme le prolongement de l'autre ? Et en ce cas, est-il vraiment besoin d'en discuter ? »

languages.text: "Peki Hür Tacir kime hizmet ediyor? Altın Taht'a mı? Protektoraya mı? Birinin diğeriyle ilişkili olduğu söylenebilir mi? Eğer öyleyse bunun üzerine konuşmak gerekir mi?"
languages.original_text: "And whom does the Rogue Trader serve? The Golden Throne? The protectorate? Could it be that one stems from the other? And if so, is there any sense in discussing it?"

traits.locale_text: "Peki Hür Tacir kime hizmet ediyor? Altın Taht'a mı? Protektoraya mı? Birinin diğerinden kaynaklandığı söylenebilir mi? Eğer öyleyse bunun üzerine konuşmanın bir gereği olabilir mi?"
